code:
gantt
    title 3.2 Project Planning & Management — Timeline
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    axisFormat  %b %d

    section Initiation
    Project Charter           :active, init, 2025-01-15, 7d

    section Scoping
    Requirements & Backlog    :req, after init, 10d

    section Iterations
    Sprint 1 (Infra_Cluster):s1, after req, 10d
    Sprint 2 (Infra_Worker):s2, after s1, 10d

    section Validation
    UAT & Sprint Review       :uat, after s2, 5d

    section Release
    Deployment                :deploy, after uat, 3d
    Monitoring & Improvement  :mon, after deploy, 7d
